name: Warmonger: Sings of the Naga
description:
Set in the gunpowder and sorcery world of the Stone, take on the role of a military commander tasked with defending their nation and allies from an unholy alliance of  wicked and alien forces.

Decide who you will help and who you will fight ... live with the consequences.

As you build your alliance of the willing, new units will be become available for you to customise your tower's and their defending squads to best compliment your strategy.

The Stone is under attack, General, what are your orders?
